author: jstrachan
msg: Removed unnecessary complication in ScriptBlock. I did add a List and an Array for speed but this led to complications in modifications to the List not being live. Have now removed the array so the list is live and things work more nicely.
Removed the minor hack added to TagSupport.trim() to get around the problem in ScriptBlock.
Defaulted whitespace trimming to true. Then any tag can explicitly turn off trimming via a trim="false" attribute.
Also added the new <whitespace> tag which will preserve whitespace inside its body.

author: werken
msg: Fixing repo's to use both jakarta and werkz for finding jars.

author: werken
msg: Edited javadocs some to get in line with Werkz vocabulary.

author: werken
msg: Jellywerkz now pretty much produces output not unlike ant's.
